mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT cinema_name from mooc_cinema_t c WHERE c.`UUID` = fie.cinema_id) as cinemaName, fie.hall_name AS hallName, (SELECT film_name from mooc_film_t f where f.`UUID`=fie.film_id) AS filmName, (SELECT show_name FROM mooc_hall_dict_t d where d.`UUID`=fie.hall_id) AS hallTypeName, fie.begin_time AS beginTime, fie.end_time AS endTime, fie.price AS filmPrice FROM mooc_field_t fie ${eq.customSqlSegment}
